overall.description: Return a matrix with ones on the diagonal and zeros elsewhere.

n.description: Number of rows in the output.

M.description: Number of columns in the output, defaults to n.

k.description: Index of the diagonal: 0 refers to the main diagonal, a positive value refers to an upper diagonal, and a negative value to a lower diagonal.

order.description: Whether the output should be stored in row-major (C-style) or column-major (Fortran-style) order in memory.  New in version 1.14.0.

I.description: A n x M matrix where all elements are equal to zero, except for the k-th diagonal, whose values are equal to one.
